sections.heading: Operational Snapshot
sections.content:
Daily digest of official releases touching Scottish and wider UK aviation activity:
- **HIAL team member volunteers in Mexico** — Gary Johnstone, Deputy Head of Fire and Airside Operations, recently completed his 14th international volunteering mission with the International Fire & Rescue Association.
- **New Chair and Non-Executive Director sought for HIAL Board** — Scottish Ministers are looking to appoint a new Chair and Non-Executive Director to the Board of Highlands and Islands Airports Ltd (HIAL).
- **First Minister visits Sumburgh Airport** — First Minister John Swinney, MSP visited Sumburgh Airport yesterday to thank the team for their hard work and continuing service to customers.
